channel.title: Runescape Members?
channel.description:
I recently got hacked once again, i have another account with like, 4m in members items, but i cant afford to pay for 2 more months for rs.
Anyone know how to get member pins or anything for free so i can get some shit off this account? Thanks.

item.title: Runescape Members?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Whip Mod Whip
item.description:
@Mod_Whip wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:11, topic:406790”][quote author=`Alec link=topic=503782.msg3686130#msg3686130 date=1311860041]
Nothing is free in life.
[/quote]

What about prizerebel, I just ordered a $10 rs pin yesterday, are you saying it’s not free?![/quote]
Yeah I use prizerebel all the time- easiest way imo is set up a VM and download the “games” and toolbars and stuff. Can get a month of members in about… 10 hours?

  1. Install the OS on the VM
  2. Install flash and java (go to runescape =p)
  3. Go download some adware on there
  4. Repeat

Plus you don’t have to be on your computer when you install the OS. If I spend 40 hours a week at work, does the money I get there count as “free” then though =)

Stupit:

No keylogger can be 100% FUD. It’s IMPOSSIBLE. It will be caught.

You’d be surprised. But antivirus companies always catch up to the less detectable stuff. The closest keylogger I have to FUD is 6/43, which is far from FUD, but lots of legit stuff has false positives of more than that…

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Members?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Whip Mod Whip
item.description:
@Mod_Whip wrote:

I use vmware downloading stuff on survey sites for members… pm if you want more info, I don’t wanna advertise a site in here, though. [quote=“vexx1345, post:8, topic:406790”][quote author=The Arcanian link=topic=503782.msg3686114#msg3686114 date=1311859143]

But how do you keep getting hacked D:?

It might be a FUD keylogger. Changing recoverys and stuff won’t make a difference. Keylogger sees anything u press on keyboard.
Theres a virtual keyboard built in windows. Search in Accessories folder. Might trick the keylogg…
[/quote]
the easiest way to make sure you dont get hacked with a keylogger is to use on screen keyboard. for some reason it always works for me.[/quote]
That’s true, but a RAT/spyware could get past that- even easier if FUD (Which I have seen). Get a bank pin though, and change your password on a different computer- preferably one at a friends house or something, lots of keyloggers have spreaders (I have one that I test for security/educational purposes that has p2p, LAN, USB, etc).

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Members?

item.description:

But how do you keep getting hacked D:?
[/quote]

It might be a FUD keylogger. Changing recoverys and stuff won’t make a difference. Keylogger sees anything u press on keyboard.
Theres a virtual keyboard built in windows. Search in Accessories folder. Might trick the keylogg…[/quote]
the easiest way to make sure you dont get hacked with a keylogger is to use on screen keyboard. for some reason it always works for me.
